pages.name: start
pages.title: Living Room
pages.body:
"dashing through the snow..."
"on a one horse open slay..."
"over the fields we goooo..."
"laughing all the way... MU HA HA!..."

You groggily come-to with 'Jingle Bells' draining into your ears.  A blurry living room around you gradually comes into focus.  You're lying on a couch, facing a log fireplace.  To your left is a hallway which leads to stairs.  To your right are two large windows.  As you sit up, you take a quick look behind yourself and see a kitchen.  You feel something cold and wet start to run down your forehead.  Wiping it away from your brow you discover it's blood.  That probably explains the splitting headache you have.
pages.prompt: Where would you like to go to next?

pages.name: living_room
pages.title: Living Room
pages.body: You are in the living room. To your left is a hallway.  Behind you is a kitchen.
pages.short_description: You are in the living room. To your left is a hallway.  Behind you is a kitchen.
pages.prompt: Where would you like to go to next?

pages.name: sleep
pages.title: Back to sleep
pages.body:
"...dashing through the snow... on one horse open slay... over the fields we goooo... laughing all the way... HA HA HA!" 

You come-to with 'Jingle Bells' draining into your ears.  Is this song on repeat??  A blurry living room around you gradually comes into focus.  You feel a little better as your head doesn't hurt as much.  To your left is a hallway which leads to stairs.  To your right are two large windows.  You're facing a log fireplace.  As you sit up, you take a quick look behind yourself and see a kitchen.
pages.short_description:
Siesta time again!
Before you know it you've come to again.  You still hear 'Jingle Bells' playing on repeat in the background.  To your left is a hallway.  Behind you is a kitchen.  In front of you is a log fireplace.
pages.prompt: Where would you like to go to next?

pages.name: grab_log
pages.title: Grab a log from the fireplace
pages.body: You pick up a smoldering hot log from the fireplace.  Pain radiates to your hand as it starts to burn you.

pages.name: burning_log_living_room
pages.title: Living Room
pages.body: You are standing in the living room holding a burning log. To your left is a hallway.  Behind you is a kitchen.
pages.short_description: You are standing in the living room holding a burning log. To your left is a hallway.  Behind you is a kitchen.
pages.prompt: What's next?

pages.name: drop_log
pages.title: Drop the log
pages.body: You drop the log back into the fireplace.  "THAT was a dumb idea," you say to yourself.  You were always one to learn the hard way.

pages.name: hallway_log
pages.title: Hallway
pages.body: You enter the hallway still clutching the burning log.  The pain becomes unbearable as the fire creeps up your arm.  You drop the log.  It lands on the hardwood flooring, setting it alight.  You try desperately to step on the fire to put it out, but this only enrages the flames.  You pass out from the pain and never wake up...

pages.name: kitchen_log
pages.title: Kitchen
pages.body: You enter the hallway still clutching the burning log.  The pain becomes unbearable as the fire creeps up your arm.  You drop the log.  It lands on the hardwood flooring can catches the floor on fire.  You try desperately to step on the fire to put it out, but this only enrages the flames.  You pass out from the pain and never wake up...

pages.name: sleep_log
pages.title: Back to sleep
pages.body: You lay back down on the couch, cradling the burning log (you must have a death wish).  Not soon after, the couch catches fire and you are engulfed in flames.

pages.name: hallway
pages.title: Hallway
pages.body: You are in hallway that is dimly lit by the fireplace in the living room behind you. Immediately your left are some dark, creepy stairs.  Slightly behind you and to the left leads to the kitchen.  In front of you is a door.  The door appears to lead to the outside, but it's dark out there.
pages.short_description: You are in the hallway. To your left are stairs and the kitchen.  In front of you is a door leading outside.  Behind you is the living room.
pages.prompt: Where would you like to go to next?

pages.name: kitchen
pages.title: Kitchen
pages.body:
Just a normal kitchen - albeit the scattered blood stains on walls and cabinets.  'What happened in here?  Looks like pig was butchered in here...' you think to yourself.
Ahead is what appears to be a bedroom.  To your left is a door that leads outside to a deck.  To your right is a pantry and hallway.  Behind you is the living room.
pages.short_description: You're back in the kitchen.  Ahead of you is a bedroom.  To your left is a door that leads outside to a deck.  To your right is a hallway and pantry.  Behind you is the living room.
pages.prompt: Where would you like to go to next?

pages.name: kitchen_open_pantry
pages.title: Open the pantry
pages.body: The pantry door opens with a long, loud creak.  The shelves are fully stocked cereals, canned goods, and various cooking ingredients.  A can of Hubs chocolate covered peanuts catches your eye.
pages.short_description: You walk into the open pantry.  That can of Hubs chocolate covered peanuts is calling your name again.
pages.prompt: Where would you like to go to next?

pages.name: eat_peanuts_in_pantry
pages.title: Eat the peanuts
pages.body: You pop open the can of Hubs chocolate covered peanuts and delicious bites at your nose.  You grab a handful and shove them in your mouth.  "Oh my god these are sooo good!" you say to yourself as you contently chew."
pages.short_description: You walk into the open pantry.  That can of Hubs chocolate covered peanuts is calling your name again.
pages.prompt: What would you like to do next?

pages.name: kitchen_peanut_allergy
pages.title: Kitchen
pages.body: You're back in the kitchen.  Ahead of you is a bedroom.  To your left is a door that leads outside to a deck.  To your right is a hallway and pantry.  Behind you is the living room.  You're starting to not feel so well. You notice your face is swelling up a little bit.  Was it something you ate?
pages.prompt: Where would you like to go to next?

pages.name: deck_door_peanut_allergy
pages.title: Deck Door
pages.body: You jimmy the door for the deck, but it's jammed.  All of a sudden you're feeling quite flushed.  Your skin is itching - everywhere.  Each breath seems a little harder to take.  You dizzily stumble to the ground and begin vommitting in between labored breaths. "I have a peanut alergy..." unforunately this realization has come too late.  You pass out in your vomit and never regain consciousness.
pages.prompt: Where would you like to go to next?

pages.name: bedroom_peanut_allergy
pages.title: Bedroom
pages.body: You enter the bedroom feeling quite flushed.  Your skin is itching - everywhere.  Each breath seems a little harder to take.  You dizzily stumble to the ground and begin to vommitting in between labored breaths. "I have a peanut alergy..." unforunately this realization has come too late.  You pass out in your vomit and never regain consciousness.
pages.prompt: Where would you like to go to next?

pages.name: living_room_peanut_allergy
pages.title: Living Room
pages.body: You enter the living room feeling quite flushed.  Your skin is itching - everywhere.  Each breath seems a little harder to take.  You dizzily stumble to the ground and begin vommitting in between labored breaths. "I have a peanut alergy..." unforunately this realization has come too late.  You pass out in your vomit and never regain consciousness.
pages.prompt: Where would you like to go to next?

pages.name: hallway_room_peanut_allergy
pages.title: Hallway
pages.body: You enter the hallway feeling quite flushed.  Your skin is itching - everywhere.  Each breath seems a little harder to take.  You dizzily stumble to the ground and begin vommitting in between labored breaths. "I have a peanut alergy..." unforunately this realization has come too late.  You pass out in your vomit and never regain consciousness.
pages.prompt: Where would you like to go to next?

pages.name: downstairs_bedroom
pages.title: Bedroom
pages.body: The bedroom is surprisingly slightly lit by large open windows and a waning moon outside.  You flip the lightswitch to try and get some additional light, but nothing happens.  "Power must be out," you think to yourself. There's not much of interest in this room save for a flashlight that's laying on the night stand.  This bedroom doesn't lead anywhere.
pages.short_description: You're in the bedroom.  Behind you is the kitchen.
pages.prompt: What's next?

pages.name: bedroom_add_flashlight
pages.title: Get Flashlight
pages.body: You grab the flashlight and inspect it.  It's got some heft to it. You read the label aloud: "Maglite ML150LR."  You flip it on and light instantly floods the bedroom.  Then you flip it back off to conserve the batteries.

pages.name: up_stairs
pages.title: Up the stairs
pages.body: You slowly make your way up the stairs and notice a trail of dark red blood as you go and being careful not to step in it.  You appear to reach a landing.  Everything is dark.
pages.short_description: You slowly make your way up the stairs dodging the trail of blood as you go.  You reach the landing.  Everything is dark.
pages.prompt: Where would you like to go to next?

pages.name: down_stairs
pages.title: Down the stairs
pages.body: You slowly head back down the stairs, being careful not to step in the blood trail as you go.  You're now in the hallway.  Directly to your left is the front door.  To your right is the living room and the kitchen.
pages.short_description: You slowly head back down the stairs, being careful not to step in the blood trail as you go.  You're now in the hallway.  Directly to your left is the front door.  To your right is the living room and the kitchen.
pages.prompt: Where would you like to go to next?

pages.name: explore_landing
pages.title: Explore the landing
pages.body: You start to feel your way around the dark.  You decide to walk straight ahead until you feel a wall.  Then, in a counter-clockwise direction, you walk while feeling the wall until you come to a door frame.  You gracefully slide through the door and then trip over something on the floor and fall into a pool of something cold and wet.  The liquid splashes into your open mouth and you instantly know it's familiar salty, bitter taste of blood.  Panicked, you scramble and slip to your feet - breaking into a sprint toward the landing.  Only, you're not running toward the landing.  You hit the railing of the staircase full speed and flip over the bar.  You fall and break your neck.

pages.name: landing_flashlight
pages.title: Landing
pages.body: You turn on the flashing and start to paint the landing area.  It reveals a large master bedroom on the left. In front of you is a hallway that leads to another room.  To your immediate right is another bedroom.  It appears to be a boy's bedroom judging by the decorations.
pages.short_description: You are in the landing area.  To the left is a large master bedroom.  In front of you is a hallway that leads to another room.  To your immediate right is a boy's bedroom.
pages.prompt: Where would you like to go to next?

pages.name: upstairs_hallway
pages.title: Hallway
pages.prompt: Where would you like to go to next?

pages.name: hallway_bathroom
pages.title: Bathroom
pages.prompt: Where would you like to go to next?

pages.name: girl_bedroom
pages.title: Girl's Bedroom
pages.prompt: Where would you like to go to next?

pages.name: master_bedroom
pages.title: Master Bedroom
pages.prompt: Where would you like to go to next?

pages.name: boy_bedroom
pages.title: Boy's Bedroom
pages.prompt: Where would you like to go to next?

pages.name: master_bathroom
pages.title: Master Bathroom
pages.prompt: Where would you like to go to next?

pages.name: front_door
pages.title: Front door
pages.body: You are viciously mauled by something in the darkness.  You desperately try to crawl in the house, while the pain exponentially intensifies.  Things go blurry as you succumb to your injuries...
pages.prompt: Where would you like to go to next?

pages.name: flashlight_front_door
pages.title: Front door
pages.body: You open the front door and then turn on your flashlight.  Almost immediately something lunges at you.  Instinctively you slam the door shut and the "thing" smacks into the door with a thud.  You catch your breath and resign to not go outside at this time.
pages.short_description: You peak back out the window of the door and see the darkness.  The creature is probably still out there.  Best not to risk it.
pages.prompt: Where would you like to go to next?

pages.name: deck_door
pages.title: Deck Door
pages.body: You attempt to open the door but it's jammed and it won't budge.  Doesn't like like you can go this way.
pages.short_description: You try the deck door again.  Same result.  It won't open.
pages.prompt: Where would you like to go to next?

title: A Very Bloody Christmas
welcome_message: Welcome to "A Very Bloody Christmas" - a choose your own adventure game.
about_author:
Josh Klahn likes to hack together web applications like one to get the practice.  Had he read the flask documentation instead searching stackoverflow whenever he got stuck, this web app might look better.
  When Josh has free time, he likes to play with his two kids or go out for a round of disc golf.

For more about Josh, visit his website:
